thread.title: based myself here for calls from the restaurant - good service, accommodating staff
thread.title_full: based myself here for calls from the restaurant - good service, accommodating staff - Review of The Soho Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Rachel K
title: based myself here for calls from the restaurant - good service, accommodating staff
text: I needed a place to work from for a couple of hours. Host found me a quiet corner in bar restaurant, gave me a charger for my cellphone and served me lunch. Fantastic service in cool surroundings with good ambience.
